name: SavingTheEarthFromRisk
description:
The game to save the Earth is an action-adventure game, in which our cute character Pory solves various missions with the start of the game. The goal of the game is to safely protect units to be followed, and to lead them safely to designated destinations through various actions and various placement of objects in the game.

TEAM) First penguin
Let's go beyond the current uncertainty and become a pioneer who bravely challenges.

Ep.

We are students who learn to make games.
It's a team project game.
It was completed after two weeks of preproduction, production, postproduction with Unreal 4.

I would like to improve the lack of games produced after experiencing the game production process through your comments.

This is not a complete version but a demo version.
Please give us a lot of feedback.
